goals__remit:
Our mission at PTC Therapeutics has always been to build an integrated biopharmaceutical company based on our expertise in RNA biology.  
 
We have focused on discovering and developing novel oral treatments for patients with serious and life-limiting disorders. By targeting the processes that modulate RNA biology and affect protein production, we bring an innovative approach to drug discovery.  
 
We are focused particularly on the development of treatments for rare and neglected disorders.
